subject: junit class loading problem
msgSnippet: Hi, Would anyone know why I m getting the following error when trying to run one test in Junit? It runs perfectly well under another project (which has a
messageBody:
Hi,
Would anyone know why I'm getting the following error when trying to
run one test in Junit? It runs perfectly well under another project
(which has a different set of libraries). Here's the error:

Cannot instantiate test(s): java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException

Thanks
